item.title: dotnet: Vector Data in .NET â€“ Building Blocks for AI Part 2
item.description:
Microsoft describes Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData as a .NET library that standardizes access to vector databases for semantic search scenarios.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: github: Improved search on the issues dashboard
item.description:
GitHub is rolling out semantic (natural-language) search in public preview on the Issues dashboard over the coming week.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: dotnet: Secure and Intelligent: Queryable Encryption and Vector Search in MongoDB EF Core Provider
item.description:
The MongoDB EF Core provider adds support for Queryable Encryption and Vector Search, letting .NET developers encrypt sensitive data while still running queries against it and build AI-powered semantic search applications directly using EF Core.

  • Source: .NET
